research.title: Deep Learning for Medical Image Analysis
research.description: Developed a novel CNN architecture for automated disease detection in medical imaging. Achieved 96% accuracy on multiple datasets.
highlights: Designed custom CNN architecture with attention mechanisms

research.title: Distributed Cache Optimization for Cloud-Native Applications
research.description: Researched and implemented novel caching strategies for microservices architectures, improving response times by 60%.

research.title: Natural Language Processing for Code Generation
research.description: Built a transformer-based model to generate code from natural language descriptions with high accuracy.
highlights: Fine-tuned GPT-based models on code datasets

research.title: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Transparency
research.description: Designed a decentralized system for tracking products across supply chains using smart contracts and IPFS.
highlights: Implemented smart contracts for product tracking
Integrated with IPFS for document storage

research.title: Real-time Anomaly Detection in IoT Networks
research.description: Developed a machine learning pipeline for detecting anomalies in IoT sensor data streams in real-time.
highlights: 98% detection accuracy with low false positives
